channel.title: CVE Feed for uFactory -- xArm5 Lite, xArm 6 and xArm 7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for uFactory -- xArm5 Lite, xArm 6 and xArm 7

item.title: CVE-2020-10285|2024-09-17T02:32:51.974Z -- ufactory -- xarm5%20lite%2C%20xarm%206%20and%20xarm%207
item.description: The authentication implementation on the xArm controller has very low entropy, making it vulnerable to a brute-force attack. There is no mechanism in place to mitigate or lockout automated attempts to gain access.
